Package server.control.database

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CancelAppointmentDB
    CancelAppointmentDB class removes an allocated appointment from the Data base.
    CreateAppointmentDB
    CreateAppointmentDB class creates an appointment in the Data base.
    CreateClientDB
    CreateClientDB class creates a new client in the Data base.
    CreateExaminationDB
    CreateExaminationDB class creates a new examination to an opened reference in the Data base.
    CreateExaminationUpdateDB
    CreateExaminationUpdateDB class updates an existed examination in the Data base.
    CreateExaminationViewDB
    CreateExaminationViewDB class gets an examination from the Data base.
    DeleteClientDB
    DeleteClientDB used to clear new clients that created with JUnit
    EndMedicalTreatmentDB
    EndMedicalTreatmentDB class updates the status of the appointment to finished and set the price of the appointment in the Data base.
    FindAppointmentsDB
    FindAppointmentsDB class search for the all coming appointments of a client in the Data base.
    FindClientDB
    FindClientDB class search for client details in the Data base.
    FindClientExaminationDB
    FindClientExaminationDB class search for all client's examinations in db.
    FindDatesDB
    FindDatesDB class search for blocked dates in the Data base.
    FindHoursDB
    FindHoursDB class search for available hours to create appointment in specific date in the Data base.
    FindMedFileDB
    The Class FindMedFileDB search for medical information in the client's clinic db.
    FindReferenceByCidSidDateDB
    The Class FindReferenceByCidSidDateDB search for reference by client's id, specialist id & date.
    FindReferenceByRefNum
    The Class FindReferenceByRefNum search for reference by reference id.
    FindSpecialistDB
    FindSpecialistDB class search for a specialists from specific specialization in the Data base.
    FindTodayAppointmentDB
    The Class FindTodayAppointmentDB get all the appointments that occur today for the logged in specialist.
    FindUserIdByUserNameDB
    The Class FindUserIdByUserNameDB search for the user id by the user name.
    GetAppointmentReview
    The Class GetAppointmentReview.
    GetBranchByUserNameDB
    GetBranchByUserNameDB class search for a branch name by a manager's user name in the Data base.
    GetBranchesDB
    GetBranchesDB class search for all branches names that stored in the Data base.
    GetClientByAppointmentDB
    The Class GetClientByAppointmentDB get client's details from the appointment id.
    GetClientIdByClientIdDB
    The Class GetClientIdByClientIdDB returns client's details by person's id.
    GetExaminationTypeDB
    The Class GetExaminationTypeDB search for the examination types that available in db.
    GetExaminatioNumberDB
    The Class GetExaminatioNumberDB search for examination details.
    GetMedicalFileDB
    GetMedicalFileDB class search for all medical information of a client in the Data base.
    InsertLabReferenceDB
    The Class InsertLabReferenceDB creates new lab reference in db.
    InsertRecordDB
    The Class InsertRecordDB adds an appointment record to appointment instance in db.
    LoginDB
    LoginDB class validates login information and updates user status to logged-in in the Data base in case the details are correct.
    LogoutDB
    LogoutDB class updates user status to logged out in the Data base.
    MonthlyReportDB
    MonthlyReportDB creates a monthly report from the information that stored in mySQL database Monthly0 report includes number of clients that got treatments, waiting time for appointments (from invite date), clients that left IHealth and missing appointments.
    NotifyEmailDB
    The Class NotifyEmailDB sends e-mails to all clients that have appointments in the next 24 hours.
    RemoveClientDB
    The Class RemoveClientDB removes client form Ghealth System and set the client's status as "left client".
    ReportMissingDB
    The Class ReportMissingDB set an appointment as missed.
    ReturnClientDB
    The Class ReturnClientDB restore client that left IHealth and now wants to return.
    ValidateReferenceDB
    ValidateReferenceDB search for approved clinic's references in the Data base.
    WeeklyReportDB
    WeeklyReportDB creates a weekly report from the information that stored in mySQL database Weekly report includes number of clients that got treatments and waiting time for appointments (from invite date) All the information grouped by the days of the week.
